short_summary: Business consultant required to improve passport program process.
description: The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires the services of a Contractor, Business consulting / Change management stream – 2.3 Business consultant at senior level, to review and to improve passport program process for Passport Modernization Directorate (PMD).
duration_in_months: For the period from contract award to 31 December 2023
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Business Consultant**

**Title:** Business Consultant
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01024550
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 100022735
**Publication Date:** 2023-02-02
**Closing Date:** 2023-02-20 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-02-10
**Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada
**Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Shanshan Gai
- **Email:** shanshan.gai@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 343-541-7089

The Contracting Authority, Employment and Social Development Canada, invites prospective contractors to participate in a Business Consultant Tender. The objective of this solicitation is to engage the services of a Business Consultant to review and improve the Passport Program Process for the Passport Modernization Directorate.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful contractor will be required to provide business consulting and change management services to:

* Provide expertise on operational transformation and management practices to identify and mobilize stakeholders and facilitate the adoption of solutions for service owners
* Improve the client experience

**Key Dates:**
- **Contract Award:** 2023-02-20
- **Contract Period:** Contract award to 2023-12-31 (with possible extensions)
- **Estimated Level of Effort:** 150 days

**Security Clearances:**
The contractor is required to have a minimum security level of Protected A (Protected B for resources).

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

**Proposed Contracting Method:**
The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) will be used to deliver this contract.

**Instructions for Submission:**
Proposals should be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the solicitation document. The TSPS Notification of Project (NPM) must be published simultaneously with the issuance of the Invitation to Suppliers.

Note: The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. To be considered a "Qualified SA Holder," please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. ^[links removed] Notebook - Tecrociz Fresh_Com
